title: Lentil and Vegetable Soup
ingredients: ['2 1/2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 spring onion, chopped', '1 carrot, chopped', '1 parsnip, sliced', '1 stick celery, chopped', '1 potato, cubed', '1 leek, chopped', '190g lentils, rinsed', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '750ml vegetable stock', '2 bay leaves', '1 dash soy sauce', '1 dash Worcestershire sauce', '125ml red wine', 'fresh coriander or fresh parsley to taste']
